title: How Online Ceramics Keeps Its Cool
description: The trippy clothing line from Alix Ross and Elijah Funk appeals to Deadheads, horror film nerds, celebrities and hype-bros in equal measure.
dc:creator: Max Berlinger
media:credit: Jamie Lee Taete for The New York Times
media:description: Alix Ross, left, and Elijah Funk of the brand Online Ceramics in their Los Angeles office.
